code.value:
from langflow import CustomComponent
from langflow.field_typing import Data
from openai import OpenAI


class Component(CustomComponent):
    display_name: str = "OpenAI STT english translator"
    description: str = "Transcript and translate any audio to english"
    documentation: str = "http://docs.langflow.org/components/custom"

    def build_config(self):
        return {"audio_path":{"display_name":"Audio path","input_types":["str"]},"openAI_key":{"display_name":"OpenAI key","password":True}}

    def build(self,audio_path:str,openAI_key:str) -> str:
        client = OpenAI(api_key=openAI_key)
        audio_file= open(audio_path, "rb")
        transcript = client.audio.translations.create(
          model="whisper-1", 
          file=audio_file
        )
        self.status = transcript.text
        return transcript.text
